name: Hollow Brush
description:
A black and white girl in a black and white world. Laura lost herself in a cold and unforgiving land. The Player's mission is to guide Laura through the harsh environments as they pick up color giving her new meaning in life. Would the player provide Laura a future with color or a future that is only gray... 

This game was made for the My First Game Jam 2023, we hope you guys enjoy!

Gameplay

A 2d pixel platformer with 5 levels to explore in. Throughout some levels, players will be able to unlock new mechanics to better traverse the environment as the encounters get more challenging. There's also a little cutscene at the end to provide the player with accomplishment!

Controls

AD / ⮜  ⮞ = Move

W / ⮝ = Jump or Use Door

Escape = Full Screen

P = Pause

More control options will be available as you progress!

Credits
  • SoulWolfx - Art and Code
  • Cooper Savage- Music

Side note: the webgl may have some hiccups in audio on rare occasions. If you want to experience the game with no hiccups, the Windows download would be the play.
